Name: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus
Desc: Dominicus, the wisher of the Harmonious Choir, is one of the many embodiments of Xipe the Harmony. Due to the interferences from the Order, his appearance is different from before. Materialized as the Hive Mind's response to wishes, the hymns he conducts can reshape the world and create new laws per the wishes, and all who made this wish will become the source of his power.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.
Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.
Makes a single target have a high chance of entering <u>Alien Dream</u>.
Enters the Charging state. Uses "Volteggiando" in the next turn.
Enters the Charging state. Uses "Tempestoso" in the next turn.

Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, and makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to all targets. After using this ability, restores Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.
Enters the "If We Live In the Light" state, gains a Shield, increases the DMG dealt, decreases the DMG taken, and makes Toughness immune to reduction.
Enters the Charging state. After 7 turns, uses "Im Anfang war die Tat."
Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. This DMG application ignores the targets' DEF.

"Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday has weaknesses of all Types. While "Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday is in the "Im Anfang war die Kraft" state, it will immediately take action after every action taken by targets and becomes immune to action delay effects caused by targets. When it becomes Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed. Moreover, after one stack of its Toughness is Broken, it applies <u>Walk in the Light</u> to targets.

"Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus summons 4 "Echoes of Faded Dreams." The DMG dealt to the Echoes of Faded Dreams is completely redistributed to "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus instead. When this unit and Echoes of Faded Dreams become Weakness Broken, additionally delays action. For every stack of this unit's Toughness that is broken, apply the <u>Walk in the Light</u> state to targets.

Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.
Makes a single target have a high chance of entering <u>Alien Dream</u>.
Enters the Charging state. Uses "Volteggiando" in the next turn.
Enters the Charging state. Uses "Tempestoso" in the next turn.
